body: While y'all is being mad at eachother, ahri needs to fix her brain and she desperately need a new one

for all my fellow vanilla boyz, this shit is non canon 'cause warwick doesn't have that tank on his back.
thank you for coming to my ted talk
This is hurt to read
@TruthTeller yo shut the fuck up its hentsi. Why are you crying about it?

@Lucifer-san also lets not get into the fact of the massive fucking double standard the fuck author is conveying here, she can ''let herself go'' but he cant get drugged and forced against his will? see i'm actively in my life trying to destroy such bullshit doublestandard stereotypes however i can, but somehow i feel like you arent doing that

also work of fiction? in works of fictions things arent as stupid complicated they can be in real life, they can be as obvious and as black and white as they are written on the fucking page, and YET this dsigusting piece of shit destroys that because he wanted some more money, that is truly disgusting and another instance of people doing retarded things for a buck, also once again, do i have to mention that some people actually care about the fictional works as they represent something aand when some cunt tries to destroy it they destroy something precious? also the term ''the road to hell is paved with good intentions'' never actually works bec

@Lucifer-san you get me wrong, actually you dont really the difference is you actually think that i wouldnt do the same to stop this irl aswell, also it may be a fictional work but that dosent change the fact that author made this out of nothing just to sell garbage and completely destroys how these characters would act, and guess what you made a larger speech than i ever did, also lets not forget the fact that this is akin to the shit that happened to got, a complete destruction of characters, for what? are you honestly saying you dont feel disgusted by reading this garbage? he cant even continue it because that's how garbage it is

Do not get me wrong - if someone tried to wrong me by stealing my significant other, I would very much like to throughly torture, use their flesh for my own personal purposes, and keep their shrunken heads as trophies (even keeping an entire room), but being outraged over a fictional character being displayed in an unsavory manner in a work of fiction does not warrant throwing a shit fit over it. Doing it over so many repeated times and on numerous different websites would cause such an action to become more of a chore over time and become rather bland.

Evil will always exist - trying to fight it by killing and justifying it "in the name of justice" is but a mere farce to practice evil while maintaining the belief that it is for a "higher purpose". Numerous people have used such rationale in the past - after all, the old adage that "the road to Hell is paved with good intentions" have persisted in history for so long.

@TruthTeller Lets face it. You and many others can hate all you want, but all there is at the end of the day is a pursuit to censor that which you do not like, all the while such acts take place in reality. You'd save fictional characters (who do not express "free will" in the sense that true living organisms do), but let NTR be rampant all over the world and videos being bought and shared throughout the Abyss Web (what I call the Dark Web/Deep Web) for anyone to access. That is - sadly- the extent of what White Knights can do. All talk, but no real strength in reality. [Humans have their dark fantasies from time to time.]

@TruthTeller You say you'll kill them all? I dare say you tell lies rather than truth. Do not get me wrong - there ARE real people who do commit NTR (which I find unsavory, considering I come from a more traditionalist Christian family), but it would be absurd even for me to declare to kill every single person who commits such an act. You do not know exactly where, when, and how each and every different person would commit it - are you going to turn the world into Orwell's "Nineteen Eighty-Four"? I would not stoop so low as to become a criminal in the eyes of the law to take out criminals in the eyes of morality.  And what about 200 years from now? Would you still keep that promise? Absurd. Even more absurd it would be when it is a mere work of FICTION is what spurs you on. [Though works of literature has indeed driven many a great person to higher pursuits, it is to be acknowledged that the work above is but more dramatized and fantastical imitation of reality.]

Meanwhile people be writing essays in the comments that has only pathos and no logos. An argument can only be an argument if it is supported by evidence and is written from an objective point of view. This is the basics for developing an argument that should have been a skill learned before graduating from high school. [You can name call all you want, but the fact is that one should not expect the opposition to respect you or even consider thinking you are correct if you think insults and swearing are the way to go]. As it stands, the average argument against NTR in the comments are deeply flawed and are more just opinions - rather than a legitimately constructed argument that supports the side one fights for. [I do not mind reading the comments, but at best they are all just white knights that are far too naive of how cruel reality is.]
